noun.description: Attributive Designating a shirt, blanket, etc., made by Pendleton Woolen Mills. [A trademark in the United States.]
A garment (especially a brightly coloured plaid sports shirt) made by Pendleton Woolen Mills. More widely: any similar garment.

origin: Early 20th century; earliest use found in The Reno Evening Gazette. From the name of the Pendleton Woolen Mills in the town of Pendleton, Oregon.
